name: "Monogram" 5 Panel Camper Cap (P1B-T0516)
description:
P1 Brand "Monogram" 5 Panel Camper Cap

5 panel camper caps have become a streetwear staple and we're proud to offer our understated version of the classic silhouette, the P1 Brand "Monogram". Featuring an embroidered, alphanumeric P1B monogram detail on the front panel, this low profile hat is a perfect fit thanks to the adjustable nylon strap. The all black twill construction is finished off with a woven P1 Brand label on the interior head band.


Cap measures approximately 4" from bill to crown. 100% black cotton twill construction with metal eyelets on side panels. Adjustable nylon strap with plastic snap buckle closure. Low profile fit with woven P1 Brand label on interior band. Available in limited quantities.

Designed, embroidered and hand-finished in the USA.


Note: Mandatory state sales tax of 8.75% will be applied to all orders shipping to California residents.

name: "Monogram" Tee (P1B-T0125)
description:
P1 Brand "Monogram" Tee 

Solid as an organized labor union and united as an assembly line, the P1 Brand "Monogram" Tee is inspired by the mechanized landscape of industrial fabrication. Showcased by an interlocking, alphanumeric monogram, the P1 Brand motto, "Victory is Black and White", is called out alongside our year of establishment, 2009, and our hometown, Los Angeles, California. 

Designed and screenprinted in the USA. Fabric is constructed of 100% preshrunk, 5.5oz. ringspun cotton. Our custom, P1 Brand tagless design ensures superior comfort around the collar, while a woven P1 Brand label on the outside, lower hem, completes the look. Available as a white imprint on a black tee or a black imprint on a white tee (not shown). 

All of our sizes are generous in cut; if you prefer a 'snug' fit, we recommend ordering one size smaller than normal. 

Small measures 18" across the chest; Medium measures 22"; Large measures 24", XLarge measures 26", 2XLarge is 28" and 3XLarge is 30" across the chest. Select desired size and colorway from the drop down menu below. Sizes and colorways not listed are already sold out.


Note: Mandatory state sales tax of 8.75% will be applied to all orders shipping to California residents.

5 panel camper caps have become a streetwear staple and we're proud to offer our understated version of the classic silhouette, the P1 Brand "Favicon". Featuring an embroidered twill patch sewn onto the front panel, this low profile hat is a perfect fit thanks to the adjustable nylon strap. name: "Track Flag" Tee (P1B-T0117)
description:
P1 Brand Track Flag Tee

Our "Track Flag" tee pays homage to one of Southern California's most notorious and influential bands, Black Flag. Their iconic logo gets a reinterpretation with a little twist, using word play and a checkerboard motif. From those long, cross-country tours to short, single lap qualifying runs, this tee recognizes that most important flag-the one at the finish line.


Designed and screenprinted in the USA. Fabric is constructed of 100% preshrunk, 5.5oz. ringspun cotton. The familiar P1 Brand Favicon is printed on the back and centered between the shoulder blades. Our custom, P1 Brand tagless design ensures superior comfort around the collar, while a woven P1 Brand label on the outside, lower hem, completes the look. Available as a white imprint on a black tee or a black imprint on a white tee (not shown). 


All of our sizes are generous in cut; if you prefer a 'snug' fit, we recommend ordering one size smaller than normal. 

Small measures 18" across the chest; Medium measures 22"; Large measures 24", XLarge measures 26", 2XLarge is 28" and 3XLarge is 30" across the chest. Select desired size and colorway from the drop down menu below. Sizes and colorways not listed are already sold out.


Note: Mandatory state sales tax of 8.75% will be applied to all orders shipping to California residents.

name: "Trackwares" Tee (P1B-T0120)
description:
P1 Brand Trackwares Tee

Introducing a classic, but distinct, homage to our signature line of products, the P1 Brand "Trackwares" tee. Born from our passion for art and motorsport, the Trackwares graphic also calls out our hometown pride, Los Angeles, California, and our year of establishment, 2009. This timeless design will feel right at home in the garage, the paddock or on the podium.

Designed and screenprinted in the USA. Fabric is constructed of 100% preshrunk, 5.5oz. ringspun cotton. Our custom, P1 Brand tagless design ensures superior comfort around the collar, while a woven P1 Brand label on the outside, lower hem, completes the look.

Available as a black tee with white imprint, shown, or white tee and black imprint, not shown, in sizes small-2XLarge. 

All of our sizes are generous in cut; if you prefer a 'snug' fit, we recommend ordering one size smaller than normal. 

Small is 20" across chest; Medium measures 22"; Large measures 24", XLarge measures 26", 2XLarge is 28" and 3XLarge is 30" across the chest.


Note: Mandatory state sales tax of 8.75% will be applied to all orders shipping to California residents.

name: "God Save Our Tyres" Tee (P1B-T0123)
description:
P1 Brand God Save Our Tyres Tee

Inspired by the 2012 Formula 1 Gran Prix of Britain, the P1 Brand "God Save Our Tyres" graphic tee is available now. With a wink and nod to the iconic 'God Save The Queen' Sex Pistols graphic by Jamie Reid, our design continues his tradition of irreverence and raw energy, while also recognizing the vital role of tire management in all forms of competition motorsport.

Designed and screenprinted in the USA. Fabric is constructed of 100% preshrunk, 5.5oz. ringspun cotton. The P1 Brand "Collage" logo is printed on the back and centered between the shoulder blades. Custom, P1 Brand tagless design ensures superior comfort around the collar, while a woven P1 Brand label on the outside, lower hem, completes the look.  Available as a white imprint on a black tee (P1B-T0123) or a black imprint on a white tee (P1B-T0124). 

All of our sizes are generous in cut; if you prefer a 'snug' fit, we recommend ordering one size smaller than normal. 

Small measures 18" across the chest; Medium measures 22"; Large measures 24", XLarge measures 26", and 2XLarge is 28" across the chest.



Note: Mandatory state sales tax of 8.75% will be applied to all orders shipping to California residents.

name: "Barrier" Key Tag (P1B-A0501)
description:
P1 Brand "Barrier" Key Tag

Constructed from durable and lightweight aluminum, the P1 Brand "Barrier" Key Tag is a simple, but sophisticated, to add a little motorsport flavor to your key ring. Features include a two-sided graphic with the P1 Brand logo on one side and the P1 Brand Barrier motif on the reverse. 

This high quality product is constructed of black anodized aluminum with a satin finish. All graphics are laser engraved, won't chip or fade and resist wear. Extremely lightweight and measures 1 1/8" x 2" x 0.040". 2" nickel-plated split ring included. 

Designed and manufactured in the USA by P1 Brand.



Note: Mandatory state sales tax of 8.75% will be applied to all orders shipping to California residents.

name: "Trackwares" Tote Bag (P1B-A0524)
description:
P1 Brand Trackwares Tote Bag

Whether you're boosting spare parts from the local junkyard, hauling produce from the farmers market or heading out for a day at the races, the P1 Brand "Trackwares" tote bag will serve you well. 

A classic, but distinct, graphic homage to our signature line of black and white products, Trackwares are born from our passion for art and motorsport. The design features our 'Favicon' front and center, calls out our hometown pride, Los Angeles, California, and our year of establishment, MMIX (2009). A woven P1 Brand label finishes off the detailing, tucked away neatly on the interior seam. 

Each heavy duty tote bag employs premium grade, 10 ounce, black cotton canvas supported by sturdy, 1.5" cotton webbing for handles. Double stitching across the top edge of the bag ensures long-lasting strength and durability. One piece, satchel bottom construction. Overall tote bag measurements are 18" wide, 15" high with a 5" gusset. 

100% designed, assembled, constructed and screenprinted, by hand, in the USA.



Note: Mandatory state sales tax of 8.75% will be applied to all orders shipping to California residents.

name: "Victory" Key Tag (P1B-A0502)
description:
P1 Brand "Victory" Key Tag

Constructed from durable and lightweight aluminum, the P1 Brand "Victory" Key Tag is a simple, but sophisticated, way to add a little motorsport flavor to your key ring. Features include a two-sided graphic with the P1 Brand logo on one side and a checkerboard motif on the reverse. 

This high quality product is constructed of black anodized aluminum with a satin finish. All graphics are laser engraved, won't chip or fade and resist wear.  Extremely lightweight and measures 1 1/8" x 2" x 0.040". 2" nickel-plated, split ring included. 

Designed and manufactured in the USA by P1 Brand.

name: "Shut Up and Race" Tee (P1B-T0109)
description:
P1 Brand Shut Up and Race Tee


Tired of hearing all of those pathetic excuses from bench racers, internet trash talkers and the like that never seem to show up at the local track? This graphic says what everyone is already thinking: "Shut Up and Race." 

Destined to be a classic, "Shut Up and Race" comes to life as 4" imprint on the left front chest, and as a large, 9" imprint centered on the back.

This graphic is also available on a screenprinted, foam can cozy right here-  http://p1brand.bigcartel.com/product/shut-up-and-race-can-cozy-p1b-a0533 

Designed and screenprinted in the USA. Fabric is constructed of 100% preshrunk, 5.5oz. ringspun cotton. Our custom, P1 Brand tagless design ensures superior comfort around the collar, while a woven P1 Brand label on the outside, lower hem, completes the look.

Join the Corps! Pledge your allegiance to the pursuit of speed with a P1 Brand "Speed Corps" Trucker Hat. United in our passion for velocity, this hat flies the Speed Corps flag on the front panel and a Speed Corps button on the back. 

Featuring an embroidered twill patch sewn onto the front panel, this black and white beauty also employs mesh side panels to keep your head cool. name: "Jim Dieter Signature" Tee (P1B-T0115)
description:
P1 Brand Industry Series Jim Dieter Signature Tee

Introducing the debut Industry Series release from P1 Brand; the Jim Dieter Signature tee. Taking inspiration from the wild world of custom car culture, the Jim Dieter Signature tee features a humorous caricature of the well-known mechanic and motorman, screenprinted on the front. The P1 Brand Industry Series logo is printed on the backside of the shirt, and a woven, P1 Brand label finishes the overall design.

Each Jim Dieter Signature shirt comes packaged inside of a quart-sized paint can, with a custom label wrap, featuring the artwork, a brief bio, and additional information about the P1 Brand Industry Series project.


About Jim Dieter
Jim Dieter has been turning wrenches to build and tune monster horsepower for all sorts of racing machines for more than thirty years. His tireless efforts to help fast racers go even faster is indisputable and measured amongst the countless National and World Championship-winning motors he has created.

About P1 Brand Industry Series
The P1 Brand Industry Series recognizes those unique and influential individuals who have positively impacted the fast-paced world of competition motorsports. All Industry Series products are released as limited editions and have been created in collaboration with their respective subjects.

The P1 Brand Industry Series logo is printed on the backside of the shirt, and a woven, P1 Brand label on the outer hem, completes the overall design.

Screenprinted with discharge inks, which allow the fabric to retain it's breathability within the imprinted areas. Every shirt is constructed of 100% preshrunk, 5.5oz. ringspun cotton. Our custom, P1 Brand tagless design ensures superior comfort around the collar. Designed and produced in the USA.



All of our sizes are generous in cut; if you prefer a 'snug' fit, we recommend ordering one size smaller than normal. 

Medium measures 22" across the chest; Large measures 24", XLarge measures 26", 2XLarge is 28" and 3XLarge is 30" across the chest. 

If you do not see your size listed in the drop down menu below, then that size is sold out.


Note: Mandatory state sales tax of 8.75% will be applied to all orders shipping to California residents.

This bold and simple graphic name-checks the winningest IFMAR World Champion drivers in history: Masami Hirosaka (14 time IFMAR World Champion), Lamberto Collari (9 time IFMAR World Champion), Ryan "Pudge" Cavalieri (4 time IFMAR World Champion) and Marc Rheinard (3 time IFMAR World Champion).
 
On the back of the shirt, the P1 Brand logo is printed between the shoulder blades and a woven P1 Brand label on the outside, lower hem, completes the design.

name: "RC Racing TV" Tee (P1B-T0128)
description:
P1 Brand x RC Racing TV Tee

For 2012 and 2013, P1 Brand has partnered with RC Racing TV to design and produce an official line of apparel for the cast and crew. The UK-based program, which airs throughout Europe on MotorsTV, provides international coverage of radio controlled racing from around the globe.

The P1 Brand x RC Racing TV tee features the new RC Racing TV logo on the left chest, and RCTV logo on the right sleeve, and the P1 Brand logo and RC Racing TV URL on the back. 

This shirt is available as a black tee with white imprint or as a white tee with a black imprint. Select your preferred colorway in the drop down menu below.

Designed and screenprinted in the USA using 100% preshrunk, 5.5oz. ringspun cotton. Our custom, tagless design ensures superior comfort. Available in sizes Medium-3XLarge. All of our sizes are generous in cut; if you prefer a 'snug' fit, we recommend ordering one size smaller than normal.

Medium measures 22" across the chest; Large measures 24", XLarge measures 26", 2XLarge is 28" and 3XLarge is 30" across the chest.

name: "3D" Snapback Flatbill Hat, Black/White (P1B-T0511)
description:
P1 Brand "3D" Snapback Flatbill Hat, Black/White

Buck the fitted hat trend with a new, premium quality, P1 Brand "3D" snapback flatbill hat. Featuring a densely embroidered, three dimensional P1 Brand logo, this structured, high profile cap, features a black and white colorway. Adjustable, snapback closure to provides a perfect fit and a rigid flatbill keeps you looking razor sharp. A small, P1 Brand 'Favicon' graphic is also embroidered on the back panel.


Cap measures 5" from bill to crown. Six panel twill construction using a blend of 85% acrylic and 15% wool. Embroidered detailing on front and back panels with adjustable, snapback fit. Available in limited quantities.

Designed, embroidered and hand-finished in the USA.



Note: Mandatory state sales tax of 8.75% will be applied to all orders shipping to California residents.

name: "Factory Blank" Tee (P1B-T0113)
description:
P1 Brand Factory Blank Tee 

Want to maintain an ultra low profile, but still carry a little P1 Brand flavor? We've got the solution: keep it clean and simple with our "Factory Blank" tees. That's right, no printed graphics anywhere on the outside of this tee, just our signature P1 Brand woven label, sewn onto the lower hem, and our great, P1 Brand tagless imprint inside the rear collar. 

Also suitable for DIY customization, the P1 Brand "Factory Blanks" are the perfect choice for those that want to apply their own graphic flair. Available in sizes small-3XLarge. Designed and finished in the USA using 100% preshrunk, 5.5oz. ringspun cotton.

Also available as a white tee with no graphic (P1B-T0114). Please be sure to specify in drop down menu below.

All of our sizes are generous in cut; if you prefer a 'snug' fit, we recommend ordering one size smaller than normal. 

Small measures 20" across the chest; Medium is 22" ; Large measures 24", XLarge measures 26", 2XLarge is 28" and 3XLarge is 30" across the chest.


Note: Mandatory state sales tax of 8.75% will be applied to all orders shipping to California residents.

name: "Badged" Hat, Flatbilled Flexfit (P1B-T0509)
description:
P1 Brand Badged Hat, Flatbilled Flexfit Hat (P1B-T0509)

Hit the paddock or the podium with style in a P1 Brand "Badged" Premium 210 Flexfit hat. Featuring two separate, embroidered, twill patches sewn onto the front and back center seams. 

This structured, high profile, black beauty also employs a rigid flatbill to keep you looking razor sharp. And get a fitted hat look, thanks to the Flexfit flexible sizing

Cap measures 5" from bill to crown. Size S/M fits 6 7/8"-7 1/4" while size L/XL fits 7 1/4"- 75/8". Six panel twill construction using a blend of 63% polyester, 34% cotton, 3% Spandex. Embroidered, twill patches on front and back. 

Designed, embroidered and hand-finished in the USA.



Note: Mandatory state sales tax of 8.75% will be applied to all orders shipping to California residents.

name: "Victory" Pit Pad™, Standard (P1B-A0513)
description:
P1 Brand "Victory" Pit Pad, Standard



The new P1 Brand "Victory" Pit Pad™ is the practical, convenient and stylish solution for your workbench or pit table. The "Victory" Pit Pad™ measures a generous 24" x 36" and is constructed of water-resistant, black foam with a textured, non-slip surface. It also features the functional, P1 Brand "Victory"  checkerboard graphic, die cut along the bottom edge, that is designed to catch and trap small parts and fasteners before they roll away from your work surface.

Whether you're wrenching in your garage or setting up a pit area at the track, the Pit Pad™ is easy and simple to transport. Thanks to the included mesh storage bag, just roll it up and stow it away. The size of the P1 Brand Pit Pad™ makes it ideal for use on any vehicle, from large, 1/8th scale nitro buggies, to small, 1/12th scale electric pan cars, and everything in between. Constructed of durable black nylon, the storage bag, and it's drawstring closure, is ultra lightweight and machine-washable. It also sports a woven P1 Brand label, sewn directly into the hem.

Measures 24" x 36" x 1/8" thick (61cm x 91.4cm x 0.30cm) when flat; 24" x 4" x 4" (61cm x 10.2cm x 10.2cm) when rolled for storage and transport. Ships in oversized, reusable, recyclable white poly bag.


Designed and manufactured in the USA by P1 Brand, using globally-sourced materials.





Note: Mandatory state sales tax of 8.75% will be applied to all orders shipping to California residents.

name: "Barrier" Pit Pad™, Standard (P1B-A0511)
description:
P1 Brand "Barrier" Pit Pad™, Standard

The P1 Brand "Barrier" Pit Pad™ is the practical, convenient and stylish solution for your workbench or pit table. The Pit Pad™ measures an ample 24" x 36" and is constructed of water-resistant, black foam with a textured, non-slip surface. The P1 Brand Pit Pad™ also features the functional 'Barrier' graphic, die cut along the bottom edge, that is designed to catch and trap small parts and fasteners before they roll away from your work surface.


Whether you're wrenching in your garage or setting up a pit area at the track, the Pit Pad™ is easy and simple to transport. Thanks to the included mesh storage bag, just roll it up and stow it away. Constructed of durable black nylon, the storage bag is ultra lightweight and machine-washable. It also sports the woven P1 Brand label, sewn directly into the hem.



Measures 24" x 36" x 1/8 thick  (61cm x 91.4cm x 0.30cm) when flat; 24" x 4" x 4" (61cm x 10.2cm x 10.2cm) when rolled for storage and transport. ; 24" x 4" when rolled for storage. Ships in oversized, reusable, white poly bag.

Designed and manufactured in the USA by P1 Brand, using globally-sourced materials.

name: "Barrier" License Plate Frame (P1B-A0517)
description:
P1 Brand "Barrier" License Plate Frame

Proudly display your appreciation of motorsports with our subtle, but sophisticated, P1 Brand "Barrier" License Plate Frame. Sporting the P1 Brand URL along the top edge, and our popular "Barrier" graphic along the bottom edge, those annoying, tailgating drivers will never know how badly you wanted to brake-check them.


This high quality product is constructed of black anodized aluminum with a satin finish. The graphics are laser engraved and will not wear, chip or fade.  Extremely lightweight, weather and sun resistant. Fits standard, 6" x 12" U.S. auto license plates and installs easy on most vehicles (mounting hardware not included).   

Check with your local DMV regarding restrictions and specifications related to the use of aftermarket license plate frames. 

Available in limited quantities.



Designed and manufactured in the USA by P1 Brand.


Note: Mandatory state sales tax of 8.75% will be applied to all orders shipping to California residents.

name: "Victory is Black and White" Sticker Sheet (P1B-A0510)
description:
P1 Brand "Victory is Black and White" Sticker Sheet

As seen around the globe at events like the IFMAR World Championships, the Euro Touring Series, the Snowbird Nationals, the International Indoor Championships and more, the P1 Brand "Victory is Black and White" Sticker Sheets are available now! 

Screenprinted with flash-cured, solvent inks, our P1 Brand Sticker Sheets, are versatile and affordable way to display your P1 Brand pride. Our two-color design uses black and white inks, with a protective clear coat, all laid down on transparent vinyl, measuring 6" x 9". Designed and produced in the USA by P1 Brand.

The artwork features a variety of P1 Brand logos and graphics in a variety of sizes. Perfect for use upon any racing machine, from a 12th scale rug rockets to a fixed gear velo frame. To use, simply trim, peel, apply and repeat. 

Two sheets per package.



P1 Brand - Victory is Black and White.



Note: Mandatory state sales tax of 8.75% will be applied to all orders shipping to California residents.

name: "I'd Rather Be Racing" License Plate Frame (P1B-A0518)
description:
P1 Brand "I'd Rather Be Racing" License Plate Frame

Maybe you're driving down to your local performance shop to pick up that new go-fast accessory? Or perhaps you're running a less-anticipated errand, like heading to the local grocery store to pick up dinner for the family? No matter where you're going, let everyone know that you'd "rather be racing" with this P1 Brand License Plate Frame.

This high quality product is constructed of black anodized aluminum with a satin finish. The graphics are laser engraved and will not wear, chip or fade.  Extremely lightweight, weather and sun resistant. Fits standard, 6" x 12" U.S. auto license plates and installs easy on most vehicles (mounting hardware not included).  

Check with your local DMV regarding restrictions and specifications related to the use of aftermarket license plate frames. 

Available in limited quantities.


Designed and manufactured in the USA by P1 Brand.


Note: Mandatory state sales tax of 8.75% will be applied to all orders shipping to California residents.

name: "Crosswalk" Serigraph Poster (P1B-A0539)
description:
P1 Brand Crosswalk Serigraph Poster

Building upon our compulsive production of unique objects suitable for living or working quarters, our limited edition "Crosswalk" serigraph poster continues the tradition.

Captured during our recent European travels, an anonymous pedestrian is transfixed mid-stride along the streets of Paris. The inspired result is a bold, high contrast print, punctuated by coarse and gritty halftone dots.

Each hand-pulled serigraph poster measures 18" x 24" and easily fits into standard sized frames. Printed on archival, 100# matte-finish, white cardstock, with the P1 Brand favicon debossed into the lower left corner. Each print is also hand-numbered, in pencil, on the lower right corner. The complete edition is limited to a total of only twenty pieces.

Ships rolled and wrapped in protective kraft paper within a three-inch, heavy duty (0.70 thickness) poster tube. Print is sold unframed.

Proudly designed and produced by P1 Brand in the USA. 



Note: Mandatory state sales tax of 8.75% will be applied to all orders shipping to California residents.

name: "MotoMemo" Notebooks, 3 (P1B-A0519)
description:
MotoMemo Notebooks 

Our P1 Brand "MotoMemo" Notebooks are a practical way to record all of your important data. Packaged in a set of three, these 3.5" x 5.5", pocket-sized notebooks will serve you faithfully at the track or in the garage. Imprinted on the front with our classic, P1 Brand Trackwares graphic, fill the archival pages with your gear ratios, track conditions or other critical notations for reference. 

Designed and hand-finished in the USA by P1 Brand.


Note: Mandatory state sales tax of 8.75% will be applied to all orders shipping to California residents.

name: "God Save Our Tyres" Serigraph Poster (P1B-A0535)
description:
P1 Brand God Save Our Tyres Poster

Inspired by the 2012 Formula 1 Gran Prix of Britain, the P1 Brand "God Save Our Tyres" is our very first limited edition serigraph art poster. With a wink and nod to the iconic 'God Save The Queen' Sex Pistols graphic by Jamie Reid, our design continues his tradition of irreverence and raw energy, while recognizing the vital role of tire management in all forms of competition motorsport.


Each hand-pulled serigraph poster measures 18" x 24" and easily fits into standard sized frames. Printed on archival, 100# matte-finish, white cardstock, with the P1 Brand favicon debossed into the lower left corner. Each print is also hand-numbered, in pencil, on the lower right corner. The complete edition is limited to a total of only ten pieces.

"God Save Our Tyres" is also available as a free, downloadable iPhone wallpaper. Grab it right here: http://www.p1brand.com/god-save-our-tyres-iphone-wallpaper

Ships rolled and wrapped in protective kraft paper within a three-inch, heavy duty (0.70 thickness) poster tube. Print is sold unframed.

Proudly designed and produced by P1 Brand in the USA. 



Note: Mandatory state sales tax of 8.75% will be applied to all orders shipping to California residents.

name: "Adam The Drake Has A Posse" Sticker Pack (P1B-A0509)
description:
P1 Brand "Adam The Drake Has A Posse" Sticker Pack

Join the Posse! 

The P1 Brand Industry Series continues with this release, our "Adam The Drake Has A Posse" Sticker Pack. Equal parts parody and homage, this humorous graphic recognizes the positive impact that Adam Drake has made on the industry. A four-time ROAR National Champion and multiple RC Car Action 'Driver of the Year' award recipient, 'The Drake' continues to impress both on and off of the track with his always helpful and friendly personality.

Originally designed in 2001, and riffing heavily on Shepard Fairey's infamous 'Andre The Giant Has A Posse' campaign, this sticker has been circulating steadily underground for more than ten years. This is the very first time the sticker has ever been commercially available.

This five-pack of stickers, each measuring 3.0" x 2.5", are screenprinted on our exclusive tamper-proof, 'destructible' vinyl which cannot be removed after application.


Note: Mandatory state sales tax of 8.75% will be applied to all orders shipping to California residents.

name: "Drive and Destroy" Sticker Pack (P1B-A0528)
description:

Wanna impress your friends and annoy your parents? You need keep a keep a few of these handy to plaster anywhere; the P1 Brand "Drive and Destroy" stickers. 

Packaged as a set of five, each measuring 3.0" x 1.5", these stickers feature our popular "Drive and Destroy" graphic, screenprinted on our exclusive tamper-proof, 'destructible' vinyl which cannot be removed after application.

Designed and produced in the USA by P1 Brand.

Note: Mandatory state sales tax of 8.75% will be applied to all orders shipping to California residents.
